html:
3.3.21  11:42 pm   bill i'm down pretty bad. what could i even do if i want to stop being friends with someone who gives me anxiety, but all of their friends are my friends and it would just make a lot of things bitter and awkward.

      have you thought about composing a situation comedy

3.3.21  11:30 pm   are you gonna run for president in 2024

      no

3.3.21  10:49 pm   in 'and the day goes on' did you intend to make the chord progression align with both ascending and descending F#Maj Scales starting from the first bar, going for a considerable amount of time (while both are playing at the same time),

     no, and i don't think it does, but you didn't specify any rhythm or pace. i'm just thinking through it as many different ways as i think you could have possibly meant, and i can't think of any way for what you said to seem true

     or am I just getting over taxated?

     possibly, or maybe i just haven't figured out how you meant it

3.3.21  8:32 pm   I saw someone online say that you are against rhyming. I think this is a misconception since there are in fact rhymes in many of your songs?

     that's not me doing rhymes. rhymes can be naturally found in nature, and i've found that they have their best effects when you don't try to search for them. But, that's not all: if you try to "make" rhymes, not only you could ruin the meaning of the words, but you'll also destroy any chance for the lines to be interesting lengths, or start and end at interesting times

      Am I correct in saying that you are specifically against "rhyming just for the sake of rhyming"?

     yes

     Also, when you are writing, how do you tell the difference between a forced rhyme and one that feels "right"?

     just listen and see how it feels

     Sorry for all the questions, thanks in advance if you answer any of these, and thank you for being an incredibly bright light in this world!

3.3.21  8:26 pm   When you write notes to yourself, do you write them so that if some random person came along and read them, they could understand,

     no, that's the editor/selector's job (also me)

     or do you only make them legible to yourself?

     i make them legible to myself. BUT, .............. i do consider myself fluent in english, so, if i am using english, it's typically going to be legible to potentially millions of other people. depending on how extreme of a linguistic license i take

3.3.21  8:09 pm   Why is there no music video for "in california"

      that is so the next song, and every song after that, could come out slightly sooner than they otherwise would have

3.3.21  6:23 pm   The human reward system releases high amounts of dopamine not when something is good but when something is better than expected. Studies have shown that this specific mechanism is highly active when people are listening to music that they enjoy. Is a song that repeats its parts (ex. verse-chorus structure) first trying to set an expectation, then exceed it in some way?

     yes

     Is that one of the foundations of music? 

     yes

3.3.21  5:08 pm   I am pretty sure i am a person. What's the second step to make a song

      write down how that's been going

3.3.21  3:35 pm   why do birds fly

      it's like when chickens cross the road except it's crossing the entire planet

3.3.21  2:45 pm   the line "i wanna write a song" in la de da de da de day oh what song would you liked to write?

      i would have loved to have written the one in the chorus immediately after that. but that didn't happen until at least 3 years later

3.3.21  11:25 am   does the day go on

      dunno, that sounds like some sort of ponzi scheme to me

3.3.21  11:05 am   Thoughts on the Real Book?

      fake but good

3.3.21  10:47 am   you once said that damien maymdien is a television host. what is his show called?

      "maybe i could eat blades of grass"

3.3.21  10:39 am   What made you decide to wear a fancy suit, put a plastic cup on your head, eat half of a banana, and toss the rest away at the end of your "no harm" music video?

      just exploring the available props

3.3.21  10:15 am   in your video "ball and stick" what was inside the castle?

      i'm not sure

3.3.21  10:08 am   Why do you think people try to find meaning in something that is not meant to truly have meaning?

      that's because of how meaningful meaningfulness can be

3.3.21  9:30 am   In here coms the sun, u say friends and neighbors, could they be one and the same?

      yes

3.3.21  8:42 am   is it helpful to have another person listen to a song you've done before you actually release it?

      i'm not sure

3.3.21  8:32 am   does damien maymdien have a backstory

      no

3.3.21  3:45 am   Why is sand called sand? Is it because it's between sea and land?

     it's the taste. salty, yet bland

     btw have a nice day

3.3.21  1:42 am   do you have advice everyone should know

      if i do, i hope it comes out somewhere

3.3.21  12:49 am   what is your genre of music?

      regular

3.3.21  12:40 am   mr. wurtz, did you actually listen to bob marley after recording "guess I've got to listen to bob marley"?

     after writing it

     also, what was your inspiration for making the song

     i heard some bob marley in a store

     and would you try a reggae-style song again?

     every day

3.3.21  12:25 am   whens your next song coming out

      pretty soon

3.3.21  12:18 am   how are you able to put the emotions in your songs?

      i'm not sure

3.2.21  10:02 pm   3.1.21  3:46 pm is it in G tho?

      it's possible to look at it that way, but my opinion for this one is no

3.2.21  8:55 pm   what is indie music to you?

     that moment when the out crowd suddenly becomes the in crowd

     and what do you think about pop music nowadays?

     it tends to have a pretty recent release date

3.2.21  8:40 pm   how did you get so good at music theory? like knowing what chords to put where

      it's probably the same way you got good at knowing which words to put in your sentence

3.2.21  6:46 pm   What greek philosopher do you identify with the most?

      pythagoras

3.2.21  6:30 pm   what do you think about trees?

      effortlessly complicated

3.2.21  5:38 pm   what's the first step to make a song

      being a person

3.2.21  5:16 pm   how do you come up with so many key changes 

      the key to changing keys is to also stay in the same key sometimes

3.2.21  5:03 pm   Is the "rabbits don't make mistakes" line a reference to Monty Python?

      no

3.2.21  5:00 pm   what do you like most about creating songs?

      someone else hearing it

3.2.21  4:17 pm   you have quite the unique stylistic choice. how did you come up with it?

      basically what usually happens is, i get a trillion ideas in my mind of what i WISH it could be like. then i get extremely disappointed to realize that none of those ways are actually possible for me to do. then, sometimes, i am able to find 1 way that is just barely possible. and i settle for doing it that way

3.2.21  3:49 pm   The lyrics "When the sun goes down and the sky burns out; We'll never slow down; Oh, we're not going down" in Mount St. Helens Is About to Blow Up, where did you find inspiration for that line?

     just common sense, really

     It's one of my favorite lines in all've your songs.

3.2.21  3:37 pm   can you start putting easter eggs in your song for us to figure out?

     i already do that

     Like putting a song time stamp thingy in one of your songs and then just like 1 4 7 14 A as in to create a sentence? the numbers being the number of letters in that song, like 1= letter B, 4 = I, 7 = L, 14 = L = B I L L or whatever to eventually create a sentence?

     no

     knowing the internet, you will prob rickroll us or smth but idc its funny

3.2.21  3:17 pm   what is the pythagoras theorem

      how the heck long a diagonal line is

3.2.21  2:23 pm   What time signature do I have when my song has 4 bars of 6/8 followed by 1 bar of 4/4 (repeating this pattern)?

     6/8 and 4/4

     How do I add those?

      write the different time signatures as they change

3.2.21  1:53 pm   Do you have lots of knowledge of musical theory or do you just pick out what sounds good, not caring about how it 'fits'?

      in what world is any of that different

3.2.21  1:47 pm   do you use polyrhythms like 5:3 and 5:4 on purpose or do you play something with an out of context rhythm and then people transcribe them as such?

      i've done both

3.2.21  12:35 pm   why do u put effort to make these vids?!

      someone's gotta do it

3.2.21  11:32 am   i want to ask;
can i be like you one day?

      sure

3.2.21  11:15 am   will you ever make longer songs out of your old videos? 

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

3.2.21  10:23 am   Is the song "hello sexy pants" actually a critique on common congressional procedures

     maybe if i knew what the procedures are

     or do you think I am reading too much into it?

     does your head hurt

3.2.21  9:44 am   what is your favorite shape

      dot

3.2.21  8:55 am   how did you get into music?

      turns out i already was into it

3.2.21  8:10 am   in "and the day goes on" how was the sun like in the first verse

      bold and fresh

3.2.21  6:32 am   what was the 2013 ending for "here comes the sun"?

      more normal

3.2.21  5:38 am   No one knows what music style you play

     except for the people who have listened to it

      but I think it's pretty obviously progressive pop.
